scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:webhook && npm run build:review
scripts.build:types: cd packages/shared/types && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:webhook: cd services/webhook-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:review: cd services/review-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared/types && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../services/webhook-service && npm install && cd ../review-service && npm install
